name: AAHVAN EK PEHAL SAMITI
briefDescription: Aahvan-Ek Pehal is a registered self-funded (NGO), working towards the welfare of women and children. We are currently working on four projects:1.Project Gyaan-Imparting education to the children of slums. Guidance counseling and awareness programs.2. Project Vrudhi-Personality enhancement classes for the children of government schools. Conducting various awareness programs for them. 3.Project Unnati-Vocational training to women below poverty line to make them earn a living for themselves .We also provide them with a platform to excel and start their own work and imparting education to them.4.Project Srajan-Conducting various activities for the disabled and spreading awareness about different kinds of disabilities.
